canvas.style: width: 99%, height: 99%; margin: 0px; border: 0px; padding: 0px; position: fixed; display: block; background-color: #aaaaff; z-index: -999

img.style: width: 100px; height: 100px; background-color: white; border: 5px solid white; left: 0px; top: 0px;

div.style: display: inline-block; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: middle;
position: fixed; width: 100%; background-color: yellow; font-size 14px; bottom: 0px; transform: translate(-50%, 0px); left: 50%; font: 14px arial

body.div: Blogumuzun kendisi çerez kullanmasa da Blogger ya da Google kullanabilir. Bu blogu açmakla bunu kabul etmiş oluyorsunuz.x

div.style: position: absolute; right: 0px; top: 0px; padding: 5px; font: 16pt sans-serif; color: white
